Articles.Content:
Hy, is it possible to create a storyline, with missions (can be linear contracts), and cutscenes? 

I have this idea of creating the 2001 Space Odyssei storyline, the discovery of a signal coming from underground moon, the scavation, subsequent triggering the beacon, the signal from saturn, the mission to follow the signal, the malfunction of HAL and soo forth

In current stock... not really.  You can certainly come up with mission parameters in your head and play accordingly, but no way to actually get parameters into the game.

However, the forthcoming "Making History" expansion is supposed to have a mission editor that will allow things of this sort.  Not sure how sci-fi-ish it will get, but likely mods fill help fill in that niche.
